IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDescription: supporting the arts in Durham and the Triangle Region in North Carolina.
IRS990.MissionDescription: TO PROMOTE excellence and access in the creation, experience and active support of the arts for all the people WITHIN THE COMMUNITY OF DURHAM, NORTH CAROLINA.
IRS990.Description: ARTS EDUCATION PROGRAMS - DURHAM ARTS COUNCIL'S ARTS CENTER SCHOOL PROVIDES ARTS EDUCATION THROUGH OVER 600 CLASSES ANNUALLY FOR CHILDREN AND ADULTS, AND 10 WEEKS OF YOUTH ARTS CAMPS. ADDTIONALLY, THE DAC CREATIVE ARTS IN THE PUBLIC/PRIVATE SCHOOLS PROGRAM (CAPS) SERVED 10,129 STUDENTS IN LOCAL SCHOOLS AND COMMUNITY SITES IN FISCAL YEAR 2009-2010, PROVIDING CURRICULUM-BASED ARTS RESIDENCIES, PERFORMANCES AND WORKSHOPS.

Activity2.Description: SUPPORT AND DEVELOPMENT OF ARTS ORGANIZATIONS AND ARTISTS - DAC PROVIDES GRANTS & TECHNICAL ASSISTANCE TO ARTISTS AND ORGANIZATIONS TO FURTHER THE ARTISTIC COMMUNITY IN THE DURHAM AREA. DAC PRODUCES CENTERFEST ARTS FESTIVAL, DURHAM'S LARGEST CULTURAL AND COMMUNITY EVENT, FEATURING OVER 200 PERFORMERS IN 26 PERFORMING GROUPS, AND 124 VISUAL ARTISTS FROM ACROSS THE U.S., SHOWCASING THEIR CREATIONS FOR 18,000 PEOPLE ATTENDING IN 2009-2010. DAC PRODUCES DURHAM ART WALK TO SUPPORT AND SHOWCASE THE WORK OF OVER 400 ARTISTS IN 40+ DOWNTOWN SITES.

Activity3.Description: ARTS PROGRAM/FACILITY SUPPORT SERVICES - DAC MANAGES AND PROGRAMS THE DAC ARTS CENTER BUILDING AS A PREMIER VENUE FOR ARTISTS, ARTS ORGANIZATIONS, AND COMMUNITY GROUPS IN HISTORIC DOWNTOWN DURHAM. DAC PROGRAMS ITS EXHIBITION GALLERIES, THEATRES, REHEARSAL SPACES, STUDIOS AND CLASSROOMS FOR THE ARTS COMMUNITY AND THE PUBLIC 7 DAYS A WEEK. IN FISCAL YEAR 2009-2010, DAC HOSTED 5,279 PROGRAMS AND EVENTS, AND SERVED 308,112 VISITORS.

Form990ScheduleDPartXIV.ReturnReference: Description of Intended Use of Endowment Funds:
Form990ScheduleDPartXIV.Explanation: DURHAM ARTS COUNCIL'S RESTRICTED, QUASI-ENDOWMENT FUNDS ARE DESIGNATED FOR SUPPORT OF DAC ARTS EDUCATION PROGRAMS, EMERGING ARTIST PROGRAM AND OTHER ARTS ORGANIZATION SUPPORT.

THE ORGANIZATION RECEIVES DONATED EQUIPMENT AND SERVICES THAT THEY WOULD HAVE OTHERWISE PAID FOR TO RECEIVE. THEY ARE ACCOUNTED FOR AS BOTH A COMPONENT OF REVENUE AND OF EXPENSE ON THE ORGANIZATION'S FINANCIAL STATEMENTS.

RecipientTable.PurposeOfGrant: BLUES IN THE SCHOOLS PROGRAM & HERITAGE ARTS FOR YOUTH PERFORMANCE SERIES

Form990ScheduleIPartIV.Identifier: Procedure for Monitoring Grants in the U.S.:
Form990ScheduleIPartIV.Explanation: Schedule I, Part I, Line 2: Recipients of Durham Arts Council (DAC) Season, Facility, Emerging Artists and Fletcher Performing Arts Fund Grants are required to submit a final written report to Durham Arts Council. These reports are reviewed by DAC senior staff to ensure compliance with grant requirements. Grant recipients are also required to make complimentary tickets available to grant supported events so that DAC staff and board may attend to observe their work. Additionally, grantees that receive state funding through DAC, are required to complete and provide to DAC a North Carolina state-issued report on the use of their grant funds.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, line 11
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: THE EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR, BOARD PRESIDENT AND BOARD TREASURER REVIEW AND APPROVE THE FORM 990 BEFORE FILING. THE 990 IS SHARED WITH THE FULL BOARD DURING THE FINANCIAL STATEMENT PRESENTATION.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, line 12c
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: AT THE BEGINNING OF EACH YEAR, BOARD MEMBERS ARE ASKED TO READ AND SIGN THE POLICY;SIGNED COPIES ARE KEPT ON FILE. IF ANY CONFLICT DOES ARISE, IT IS DISCUSSED WITH THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS AND THE BOARD WOULD VOTE TO DECIDE THE OUTCOME.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, line 15a
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: THE EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR RECEIVES AN ANNUAL REVIEW WHICH IS DISCUSSED WITH THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS AND USED TO DETERMINE THE AMOUNT OF COMPENSATION FOR THE YEAR. THE AMOUNT DETERMINED BY THE BOARD IS COMMUNICATED IN WRITING TO THE FINANCE MANAGER.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section C, line 19
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: THE ORGANIZATIONS GOVERNING DOCUMENTS AND FINANCIAL STATEMENTS ARE AVAILABLE TO THE PUBLIC UPON REQUEST.
THE PROCESS HAS NOT CHANGED FROM THE PRIOR YEAR.
